lines:
1956

August 30, 1910.

Mr. S. C. Luki

Care Chinese Students Conference,

Trinity College, Hartford, Conn.

My dear Luks:

Your letter of August 29th was delayed in reaching ne, owing

to my absence in the woods.

I have just returned to Andover and am hasten -
ing to send you check for $50. as raquested. I hope you will not have been 
inconvenienced by the delay. Kindly sign and return the inclosed receipt.

Wishing you a most enjoyable and profitable ting at the Conference,

and with kind regards to all, believe me,

Sincerely yours,

Principal.
raw: 1956 August 30, 1910. Mr. S. C. Luki Care Chinese Students Conference, Trinity College, Hartford, Conn. My dear Luks: Your letter of August 29th was delayed in reaching ne, owing to my absence in the woods. I have just returned to Andover and am hastening to send you check for $50. as raquested. I hope you will not have been inconvenienced by the delay. Kindly sign and return the inclosed receipt. Wishing you a most enjoyable and profitable ting at the Conference, and with kind regards to all, believe me, Sincerely yours, Principal.

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter enclosing the $50 requested. sends good wishes to Luk and his friends for the conference.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
